title: The One After Vegas
synopsis: Ross and Rachel wake up together, not realizing they got married the night before. Monica and Chandler talk about moving in together.

title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
synopsis: Ross has to tell Rachel that they're still married. Chandler is moving in with Monica, and Rachel assumes that she'll be living with them.

title: The One with Ross's Denial
synopsis: Ross asks Rachel to be his roommate, refusing to admit that he still has feelings for her. Monica and Chandler argue about the apartment.

title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
synopsis: Joey gets a hernia but doesn't have health insurance to cover getting it treated. Ross puts on a British accent while teaching his new class.

title: The One with Joey's Porsche
synopsis: Joey pretends that he owns a Porsche. After the incident in Vegas, Ross is feeling like a failure because he's about to get his third divorce.

title: The One on the Last Night
synopsis: Joey is broke but won't accept help from his friends, so Chandler lets him "win" money in a game. Rachel gets ready to move and fights with Monica.

title: The One Where Phoebe Runs
synopsis: Phoebe looks goofy when she runs, so Rachel is embarrassed to go jogging with her. Joey is attracted to his new roommate, Janine.

title: The One with Ross's Teeth
synopsis: Ross whitens his teeth to impress a girl, but he goes way overboard. Phoebe tells Rachel that she hooked up with Ralph Lauren.

title: The One Where Ross Got High
synopsis: Monica and Ross's parents don't like Chandler because they think he smoked pot in college. Rachel makes a disgusting Thanksgiving dessert.

title: The One with the Routine
synopsis: Joey, Ross and Monica dance on "Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve." The rest of the gang searches for Monica's hidden Christmas presents.

title: The One with the Apothecary Table
synopsis: Rachel buys a table from a fancy store and tells Phoebe she got it at the flea market. Janine tells Joey that she doesn't like Monica and Chandler.

title: The One with the Joke
synopsis: Chandler and Ross both try to take credit for a joke. Monica is insulted when Phoebe says Rachel would make a better girlfriend than her.

title: The One with Rachel's Sister
synopsis: Rachel's sister, Jill, comes to Rachel for help after her parents cut her off financially. Working as a waiter, Joey hits on the Central Perk customers.

title: The One Where Chandler Can't Cry
synopsis: When Chandler says he hardly ever cries, everyone tries to make it happen. Rachel's sister, Jill, dates Ross to annoy Rachel.

title: The One That Could Have Been: Part 1
synopsis: The gang imagines what life would've been like if Rachel had married Barry, Phoebe became a business executive and Monica was still fat.

title: The One That Could Have Been: Part 2
synopsis: The friends continue to ponder an alternate past in which fat Monica seduces Chandler and married Rachel almost cheats on Barry with Joey.

title: The One with Unagi
synopsis: When Rachel and Phoebe take a self-defense class, Ross claims he's a martial arts expert. Chandler and Monica forget to buy Valentine's Day gifts.

title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
synopsis: One of Ross's students asks him on a date. When there's a fire in their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe have to stay with Joey or Monica.

title: The One with Joey's Fridge
synopsis: Joey tries to convince someone to buy him a new fridge. Ross is worried that his girlfriend will cheat on him during spring break.

title: The One with Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E
synopsis: Joey's up for the lead in a new TV show, but Chandler forgets to leave him a message that the audition time has changed.

title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeth's Dad
synopsis: Ross makes a bad impression on Elizabeth's dad, who doesn't approve of them dating. But Elizabeth's dad takes an interest in Rachel.

title: The One Where Paul's the Man
synopsis: Ross and Elizabeth sneak off to the family cabin, where Rachel and Paul -- who threatened to have Ross fired for dating a student -- are also headed.

title: The One with the Ring
synopsis: Phoebe is the only one who knows that Chandler is going to propose to Monica, and she lies to Ross to keep him from finding out.

title: The One with the Proposal: Part 1
synopsis: Chandler's plan to propose to Monica is interrupted when they run into Richard. Joey accidentally buys a boat for $20,000 at a silent auction.

title: The One with the Proposal: Part 2
synopsis: Richard tells Monica he still loves her. Chandler's attempt to make the proposal a surprise leaves Monica thinking he doesn't want to marry her.
